DOC.brief_summary: To compare pregnancy rate Human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( HCG ) administration urinary Luteinizing Hormone ( LH ) surge method insemination patient undergoing Intrauterine Insemination ( IUI ) Montaserieh infertility center . The present study comprise 309 infertile woman candidate IUI , randomly divide LH surge HCG group ( assign number patient , odds number LH even number HCG group ) . All patient subject baseline ultrasound receive clomiphene citrate undergoing serial transvaginal sonography . LH measure use LH kit 2-5 follicle ( 18-20 mm ) appear LH surge group , positive , IUI perform 24 hour . In HCG group , patient receive HCG 1000 unit underwent IUI 36 hour . The pregnancy rate compare LH HCG group .
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy Rate HCG Administration Versus Urinary LH Surge Method Patients Undergoing IUI
DOC.criteria: infertile woman candidate IUI woman negative urinary LH surge require HCG administration , 5 follicle use LH kit receive HCG avoid ovarian hyperstimulation .
